entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • apicompat --package-assembly-references is difficult to use #41686
  • [ppc64le][mono] dotnet tool update -g is failing #41672
  • HandleTypeLoadFailure watch test timing out when testing with desktop msbuild #41669
  • dotnet runtime not showing up after installing, runtime, sdk, desktop, and app (version 8.0.6) #41666

Closed

  • `slnx` wildcard support #41465

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unskip tests with Done issues + dotnet-format test fix #41684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Backport https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/41506 #41682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix issue with externally defined static assets and compression clashes #41681
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix incremental build for extract-sdk-archive.proj #41671
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve test logging and re-enable terminal logger #41670
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Documentation to fix issues when running `zsh` #41668
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove live msbuild and runtime dependencies from fsharp #41683
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixup SDK build #41664
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add testFullMSBuild env var to the test step #41656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Implement support for multi-process Hot Reload #41324
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add warning when targeting net standard less then 2.0 #41660
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
